docker pull stratisplatform/stratisfullnode:Stratis.CirrusMinerD-1.1.0.0-ext


docker run -p 38223:38223 stratisplatform/stratisfullnode:Stratis.CirrusMinerD-1.1.0.0-ext

git clone https://github.com/stratisproject/Stratis.SmartContracts.Tools.Sct


cd Stratis.SmartContracts.Tools.Sct

dotnet build

dotnet run validate ../../StratisHelloWorld/HelloWorld.cs -sb


curl -X 'GET' \
  'http://localhost:38223/api/Wallet/list-wallets' \
  -H 'accept: */*' | jq '.'


curl -X 'GET' \
  'http://localhost:38223/api/Wallet/accounts?WalletName=cirrusdev' \
  -H 'accept: */*' | jq '.'

curl -X GET "http://localhost:38223/api/Wallet/addresses?WalletName=cirrusdev&AccountName=account%200" -H "accept: application/json" | jq '.'

curl -X 'GET' \
  'http://localhost:38223/api/Wallet/addresses?WalletName=cirrusdev&AccountName=account%200&Segwit=true' \
  -H 'accept: */*' | jq '.' 


curl -X POST "http://localhost:38223/api/SmartContractWallet/create" -H "accept: application/json" -H "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json" -d "{ \"walletName\": \"cirrusdev\", \"amount\": \"0\", \"feeAmount\": \"0.001\", \"password\": \"password\", \"contractCode\": \"\", \"gasPrice\": 100, \"gasLimit\": 100000, \"sender\": \"PRm6QoGgeiRjYjqeRV762VhWVx5yuyid9J\"}"

Response: 4bee991900dfe85810e03c7bdaf941dc3cecf5dea1ca34a42651305f26a755a0


curl -X GET "http://localhost:38223/api/SmartContracts/receipt?txHash=4bee991900dfe85810e03c7bdaf941dc3cecf5dea1ca34a42651305f26a755a0" -H "accept: application/json" | jq '.' 
{
  "transactionHash": "4bee991900dfe85810e03c7bdaf941dc3cecf5dea1ca34a42651305f26a755a0",
  "blockHash": "f636ca79f4fdc3ce789e267e32c1b53d47d78409881f8fad76e1e68d9a2ce50f",

  "from": "PRm6QoGgeiRjYjqeRV762VhWVx5yuyid9J",

  "returnValue": null,

  "error": null,
  "logs": []
}


curl -X POST "http://localhost:38223/api/contract/PXsSb2uUi1oXC37NSD26n3zhJ9utULe5Rg/method/SayHello" -H "accept: application/json" -H "GasPrice: 100" -H "GasLimit: 100000" -H "Amount: 0" -H "FeeAmount: 0.01" -H "WalletName: cirrusdev" -H "WalletPassword: password" -H "Sender: PRm6QoGgeiRjYjqeRV762VhWVx5yuyid9J" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{}" | jq '.' 

{
  "fee": 11000000,
  "hex": "",
  "message": "Your CALL method SayHello transaction was successfully built.",
  "success": true,
  "transactionId": "39ed0de8b1e3bfbf56a6182906b153ac32140df30efca45b40712d7e630983aa"
}

curl -X GET "http://localhost:38223/api/SmartContracts/receipt?txHash=39ed0de8b1e3bfbf56a6182906b153ac32140df30efca45b40712d7e630983aa" -H "accept: application/json" | jq '.'
